channel.title: A Md5 hash, can't crack it on almost every md5-sites, anyone help?
channel.description:
Hey, all,
15cf5b8fb93e35039ee84d3145360d49
That's the md5 hash. Checked almost every md5 cracking website, but still no luck.
Anyone can help with that?
Thank you in advance!

item.title: A Md5 hash, can't crack it on almost every md5-sites, anyone help?

item.title: A Md5 hash, can't crack it on almost every md5-sites, anyone help?
item.dc:creator: Nitrax
item.description:
@pharaoh I don’t know if you already have resolved your problem however, if you have a decent GPU, try Hashcat which provides better perfs than John and is more efficient.

Hope it helps.

Best,
Nitrax

Read full topic
item.source: A Md5 hash, can't crack it on almost every md5-sites, anyone help?

item.title: A Md5 hash, can't crack it on almost every md5-sites, anyone help?
item.dc:creator: pharaoh
item.description:
Nope, john is still running.
I just created a new file pw.txt with the following contect:
admin:15cf5b8fb93e35039ee84d3145360d49

Then in the shell:
john --format=Raw-MD5 --incremental pw.txt

Seems nothing wrong.

Let me know if there’re mistakes.

Read full topic

we tend to use passwords means something to us, especially to someone who is not very much caucious.
